March 7, 2015 D Valley Entertainment Contest (Championship Brass)
Valley Entertainment Contest (Championship Brass) 1 Entertainments Contest Valley Entertainment Contest valley-entertainment-contest-championship-brass
Valley Hotel, Fivemiletown, County Tyrone, Northern Ireland, UK Best March Downshire Brass (Blaze Away) Best Soloist Downshire Brass - Brendan Coyle (Feeling Good) Most Entertaining Band 1st Old Boys Silver Band

March 10, 2015, 1:53 p.m. March 11, 2015, 9:47 a.m.
